# TPT2_CombatScripts
Ai Scripts to be used while towertesting in the perfect tower 2. Includes almost everything you would need during towertesting.

**by default of these have an impulse of wake up and will wait in the town menu until you start a tower testing run and will go back to waiting when you end it, change it if you prefer something else.**




Simple Ability Spam: cost very little ram and will use all abilites from 1-15 as soon as they come off cooldown.
``````

Customizable Ability Spam: costs a lot more ram but lets you choose which abilites you want to spam and not spam, for example you can make it not use dispel if you dont want to waste energy while not debuffed.

``````

Smart Dispel: Will use Dispel only when afflicted with a negative buff. Edit the script and set the dispel variable to which slot dispel is in and make sure no other scripts are using dispel.
``````

Smart Dark Sacrifice: Will use Dark Sacrifice to keep you below 50% hp to take advantage of tower hp% based modules like strikeback and shelter.
``````
